---
  title: "Join Us"
---

Note that you don't have to be a member of ASA BIOP to join the SWE WG. \
There are multiple ways to get involved with the ASA BIOP SWE WG:

-   Join as a working group member, who attends the ASA BIOP SWE WG meetings.

-   Join as a task force member, who actively contributes to one or several task force(s).

If you are interested to join the ASA BIOP SWE WG, please contact us: [Daniel Sabanes Bove](mailto:daniel.sabanes_bove@roche.com) or [Ya Wang](mailto:ya.wang10@gilead.com)
